price: Enti (nkͻmhyεni), nya deε wͻrekeka no ho aboterε, na bͻ wo Wura Nyankopͻn abodin ansa na awia apue (ne εbrε a) ansa na (awia) bεkͻ akͻtͻ.
arabic: فَٱصۡبِرۡ عَلَىٰ مَا يَقُولُونَ وَسَبِّحۡ بِحَمۡدِ رَبِّكَ قَبۡلَ طُلُوعِ ٱلشَّمۡسِ وَقَبۡلَ ٱلۡغُرُوبِ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: fa-iṣ'bir ʿalā mā yaqūlūna wasabbiḥ biḥamdi rabbika qabla ṭulūʿi al-shamsi waqabla al-ghurūbi
